 	for _, r := range repos {
+		if *flagSkipMissing {
+			cmd := exec.Command("git",
+				"--git-dir",
+				path.Join(dir, *r.FullName),
+				"rev-parse",
+				"--verify",
+				revision,
+			)
+			if e := cmd.Run(); e != nil {
+				log.Printf("Skipping missing revision repo=%s rev=%s",
+					*r.FullName, revision,
+				)
+				continue
+			}
